website_summaries.verdict: Has everything most consumers love in this type of wallet: superior wallet and chain construction, good looks, and functional interior. Hands down the best chain wallet on our list.
pros: Offers a superior design and features
Long build with ample pockets and slots
Zippered compartment that fits most phones
Genuine leather has a rich brown color
cons: Rare reports of issues with the stitching

customer_reviews.title: Good leather wallet for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a great price. Honestly the tiger wasn't something I really wanted but it was on sale. I'm glad I bought this wallet. I've had it for several weeks and I'm pleased with the quality. If you want a large leather wallet with a chain and plenty of storage this is a good one. The chain isn't the best but it works. I'll replace it later with a dog choke chain like I do with almost all of my wallets. The wallet is as good as others I've owned that were 50-70 dollars so I'm very satisfied. Would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I needed more room and this was the perfect fit. Several concerns I had are
customer_reviews.text: I needed more room and this was the perfect fit. Several concerns I had are: the zipper/overall quality may be too cheap, it may be too thick for my back pocket, and it may difficult to sit since it sticks out my pocket. All of the concerns were unfounded. This wallet works great. My only caution is for those with very small/tight pants pockets. I typically wear jeans and dress pants. Very tight/small pockets may find this wallet to be too big. I would buy this again. The primary reason I bought this wallet is because it has a zipper and received good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: This wallet had excellent quality and attention to detail
customer_reviews.text: This wallet had excellent quality and attention to detail. Buying this as a gift for someone who recently lost an authentic Louis Vuitton Men’s long wallet. This seems more durable and I love the extra storage. iPhone fits inside too as long as you don’t overstuff the wallet which I like. Tried with iPhone X with Apple leather case on. Zipper quality is excellent and smooth. Could recommend more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: This wallet is not leather.
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is overly heavy because it is not leather. The chain broke after one day's use. My teens wanted a leather wallet with a chain, so I was happy to purchase 2 of this brand of wallet for them. But now they are stuck with a fake leather, moldy smelling chain wallet. This has been an on going problem with Amazon selling low quality items from China.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Since day one, when I started to wear this. I got nothing but good complements. I have been telling everyone, where to buy from. I got tired carrying my purse to work, when in fact all I need is my car keys, phone and gum. It is advertised for Men, but I didn't care , I love it.
customer_reviews.author: gremoney

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent wallet and fits into the back pocket of all my pants.
customer_reviews.text: I have adult ADD at 65 years old and I'm always losing my wallet, so I purchased this chained-wallet out of necessity. I wear tactical pants, blue jeans, and khakis. This wallet fits in the back pocket of all of them. This wallet is durable, functional, comfortable to sit on and the chain is very strong construction. High quality. I would recommend this product to anyone except for petite guys giving one star on this review. They are the guys with little tiny Guest Jeans feminine pockets (they bitch because it will not fit). **** This is a REAL man's wallet ****
customer_reviews.author: Scott in Mexico

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I love the bag. I truly do. But I don't like that the piece that connects the bag to the thigh strap has broke. It broke within a week or two of wearing it. I have since taken off the thigh strap and will see if I can manually repair the connector piece. It is real leather and has that awesome leather smell. Very comfortable to wear. It has plenty of room to stash a wallet, phone, keys, and headphones with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy VC

customer_reviews.title: a great wallet for a great price
customer_reviews.text: i needed to replace my wallet because my other wallet broke, its a very great upgrade from my other wallet it has much more room for my cards, and the change compartment really comes in handy i got really tired of needing a place for my change and i always picked my pocket and we all know how annoying that is but with this wallet i dont have that problem, the chain is very tough so very good to make sure its on my person so thank you guys its a really great wallet
customer_reviews.author: logan c.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality leather but practical wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Leather is pretty poor and damages where it locks. On the first day of use, it had many marks like if it had a few years. I keep two star because inside it's really practical, and chain is of good quality overall too bad the leather really sucks. Will try and use leather products and see if it recovers, in which case I'll add some stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wearing in nicely!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the suede hoping it would wear into a darker gloss finish. So far so good on that front after about three months and the stitching and leather all seems to be holding together well. I expecte to get about a year out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tactical Bunny CA

customer_reviews.title: Cool wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is great I like the soft leather.👌 It holds everything I need it to. Only two things keep it from having five stars first the chain comes apart too easy and second I wish you had snaps on both sides not just the one. This is definitely a thumbs-up buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Horton

customer_reviews.title: crummy  zipper=defective  never worked  splits open =everything pops out cash==more cash
customer_reviews.text: ====lousy zipper does not work======hi! zipper went out soon as we got it the wallet thanks! or send another thanks!! defective zipper splits open thanks! hi we tried to reach you no go!======1621 richmond nw dept 6 grand rapids michigan 49504 =======24 hr service====called back several times unable to reach ===we wanted to order more unable to reach called again left messages no go =====we can order some place else for our workers takes to long to order thanks!!no warranty on anything at all ======we called a bunch of times
customer_reviews.author: richarddevosjr

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmm.....?
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent wallet but I guess I didn't realize how big it actually is. It's not that comfortable to wear. I drive all day so I dont keep it in my pocket, but the times that I have worn it, it has started to Frey at the top...that's also disappointing for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Jasen Jensen

customer_reviews.title: This wallet is probably the best one I have owned in my life
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is probably the best one I have owned in my life. Not only has it held up over the months that I have been using it, but I am able to fit all my cards, business cards, cash and coins along with my checkbook in one place. I would recommend this wallet for anyone that has a lot to carry but doesnt have the room and always has over flowing pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: returning
customer_reviews.text: bought for husband - he didn't like it because it doesn't fold open flat on both sides & various parts (ex. card slots ) weren't easily accessible because of this. Other than that, it appeared to have some quality & there are many openings for storage
customer_reviews.author: Wilma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Secure & High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Wallet in soft brown leather with vintage chain. At first, I thought it was missing the chain, but it is in the zippered pouch of the wallet. This is a gift to someone who keeps losing $ from his wallet because it slips out of his pocket. So the chain is needed. But it is an excellent choice if you simply want it for beauty's sake.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Stone

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME - LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS bag!!! Very well made - this is going to really make my steampunk cosplay outfit complete! I needed something this size to hold my note 8 cell phone, it's perfect. The rugged look is also perfect - I will still use this bag when on outings where I don't want to carry around a purse. The strap around the leg is adjustable and really helps to keep the bag in place. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Leather can’t hold up the chain
customer_reviews.text: We have bought two of these wallets now, and this one was ridiculous. My husbands first lasted him around 2 years which is really good considering a really rough work environment. Gave it to him a week before Christmas and 4 days in he went to pull it out of his pocket by the chain and the leather where the chain connected ripped. So if you’re looking to use the chain, this might not be the best wallet. The snap close is a nice feature though and otherwise he liked the wallet
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Stitching not durable
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t even used wallet for a week and the stitching is all ripped out already
customer_reviews.author: kellie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Actually real leather. It’s just like the picture. Had for a week so far not one complaint. I keep in my back pocket and th wallet has not shown any type of breaking like cheap wallets do.
customer_reviews.author: Its_Highnoon

customer_reviews.title: Great security
customer_reviews.text: The size and chain are great. Just wish it would have been a higher quality leather. I would have paid more for a higher quality leather!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet, bad chain/hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap chain that kinks up and even broke twice. Ordered a length of chrome chain to remedy. Snap on belt loop is kind of janky. Need to take to leather shop for repair. Otherwise, great wallet portion.
customer_reviews.author: Seahawk

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but you WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED. 🌞
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome awesome. I love it and im going to order another one. The smell of the leather is awesome. 100%quality
customer_reviews.author: Big book

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: it covered all the requirements i was looking for in a "murse" (which i desperately did not want him to have) for my significant other. this was the only wallet that had large capacity of card slots as well as room for everything else he might need in his wallet, Especially $$. We love it!!! Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this wallet! It was a great value for the money and has held up very well. He says the flap does not make the wallet bulky.
customer_reviews.author: FlashyHotrod

customer_reviews.title: Nice things
customer_reviews.text: I rarely give 5 stars. This wallet is so cool. Its tough rugged and durable. I needed space for cards and I got that and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher David

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband and he loves it. Better let it air out for a couple of days, its raw leather and smells like it. Overall hubby likes it alot
customer_reviews.author: Betsy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality! The zippers work like silk and it is a nice rich cinnamon brown color. Its very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cybermonkey

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, but it’s bigger then my cell phone .. not a wallet in your pocket kinda deal.. but it’s so beautifully made.. I will keep it and use it when I travel.. it can hold your phone..
customer_reviews.author: myke spezzano

customer_reviews.title: Good Size for Me
customer_reviews.text: Good size for me. I have a lot jammed in there, including about twenty six or so debit/member cards etc, gum, pen, checkbook, cash, receipts, chapstick. You get the point. Very happy with the finish inside and out. Been using about two months and no signs of wear at all.
customer_reviews.author: Just Dude

customer_reviews.title: Edges frayed after a few days use
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is very nice looking but the edges started to fray badly after a few days use. The return was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: Cool wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet nice and solid. However can have a better stitching for the chain part.
customer_reviews.author: Agentice9

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wallet$$ Definitely a must buy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Wallet for almost 2 months now and the wallet is solid. Very good quality leather and fits in my pants back pocket perfectly. The leather leash broke after a couple days to the leather ends not being tied together. I already had a previous chain so I attached that. Perfect long wallet!
customer_reviews.author: E Francis

customer_reviews.title: A great rustic wallet.
customer_reviews.text: If you're want a rustic look, this wallet is just what you are looking for. Plenty of card pockets, lots of room for cash, a zippered coin pocket and two visible ID pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Real Unbiased Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Instantly I was happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Instantly I was happy with this product. I am very impressed with the size and quality of the wallet. It has a great leather smell and nice feel to it. Like any leather your cards will be tight at first to pull out but don’t worry this wallet will age great and I’m excited to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Not to thick but thick enough to not feel cheap. Chain is nice too. Brass looking chain. Picture is dark but it is dark brown in person.
customer_reviews.author: Simona

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag! It's very rugged looking, not bulky and fits perfectly on the hip and thigh!
customer_reviews.text: This hip bag is exactly as shown, is genuine learher, and very well made. It's rugged looking but not too big or bulky and the straps fit perfectly and can be adjusted so that it fits very comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Quality leather/ snaps NOT good.
customer_reviews.text: Snap broke the FIRST day I used it...but leather seems to be quality ...I really liked the wallet and chain...would like to have it, just not broken 👎 After seeing this review they sent a new wallet, sooo I would definitely order again. Customer service IS amazing and the new one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne McDonald/ Richard Scoggins

customer_reviews.title: Nice, durable leather wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is a nice light leather color. Seems really durable so far. Have a zipper inside for change. I like the longer wallets that hold a lot of money. It will hold about $5000 in $100 bills. Baller..... out.
customer_reviews.author: Tysbenz

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday and it's nice but a bit bulky! Love the chain, I'm a mechanic and it's so far not hurt a vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Holtsman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wallet
customer_reviews.text: Amazing wallet, great quality leather. Box style chain was a nice change from standard chain
customer_reviews.author: jason jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly meet my needs
customer_reviews.text: The wallet seems to be made of high quality leather with plenty of room for all the junk I carry around. pretty much exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Beautiful Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful full grain leather wallet engraved with an Asian Dragon, very nice brass finish fob chain, an unusual long wallet that stands out. Purchased as a gift, couldn't have been more pleased when it arrived, and the the recipient was impressed also. It was not inexpensive, but worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: a good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's a little longer than I pictured. The supplied chain is kind of cheap, but the belt loop and hooks look decent. I used my own chain and loop. Overall, a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Too another 29 years.
customer_reviews.text: My father love it he said it was nice thick leather looks to last longer than the old one I gave him 29 years ago and made of thinner leather. He Loved the card holders in side said it sits a lot better in the pocket . The old one was like sitting on a rock to him because all the fell to one side , and he loves he can keep change in it as well. I liked his so much when I see I got me one too. So he had a good Birthday.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Weak seams
customer_reviews.text: Seams are not very strong comes apart quickly with normal use but not bad wallet and kool looking
customer_reviews.author: Cean

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is great except for the strap that keeps it closed. It broke off shortly after my dad started using it
customer_reviews.author: ediemeans

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Really nice wallet! Durable with nice chain. Perfect size. Would buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lori london

customer_reviews.title: Great size and several slots for cards
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this wallet it is large, and holds cards so you don’t have to put two in one slot. Only things I dislike is if you have a IPhone S it doesn’t fit, and the slot for photo ID is hard to get ID out.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great service and product
customer_reviews.text: The wallet was everything it claims to be. Beautifully made and seems very well constructed also. I fully recommend purchasing from this seller, you will be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyC2121

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Yes it’s large but I didn’t buy it to not carry random stuff or pictures or actual cash money and change. Legit wallet and even the chain isn’t bad. Everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality holds all your cards and your cash. hidden zipper to stash some cash
customer_reviews.author: Majic

customer_reviews.title: Not leather
customer_reviews.text: Its not leather.. is that faux leather.. tiny strings unravel around edges of wallet after a week..chain broke near belt had to repair myself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice he loves it and it's very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever
customer_reviews.text: Literally the most perfect fathers day gift ever. Only downfall my husband said was, "tiny not as big as the traditional ones &could have left out the change holder".
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: The design
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this! Haven't bought a new wallet in a few years!
customer_reviews.author: Je'Wayne E Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems to be built too last but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Very shotty craftsmanship, rivet broke first day, within a week the chain had several links coming apart and within two weeks my cards had cut holes in the interior stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would order again
customer_reviews.text: I am been looking for a plain. Wallet with a zipper on the inside for my husband for 2 years. This wallets seems like good quality for the price! Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Davis

customer_reviews.title: poor stiching
customer_reviews.text: started going unstiched right away, shape is hard to put in pocket . chain came off after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: bruce rademacher

customer_reviews.title: Item of lesser quality.
customer_reviews.text: Chain broke the first day of use. No wonder it was so inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Mealey

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with my purchase of this product
customer_reviews.text: For the price ... there is no beating this wallet! Quality leather and very functional. I can see myself buying this product again in the future for myself or as a gift. I'm very pleased with my purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L. Van Tassel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality leather wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great quality leather wallet. In constant use for several weeks now and still in good condition. Sturdy chain holds firm. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: frances martinez

customer_reviews.title: Have had for 2 months and I love it. plenty of credit card space and nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had for 2 months and I love it. plenty of credit card space and nice zippable area in middle of wallet.
customer_reviews.author: quick

customer_reviews.title: Wallet is nice and roomy
customer_reviews.text: Wallet is nice and roomy. The chain and the leather strap the connect to your belt are garbage. Leather piece and snap broke after two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Allen H.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very displeased within the first 2 to 3 hours the chain was broke it was bigger and gawking than I anticipated and is not real leather I sent it back just like Amazon no problems with the return
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: So I have had this wallet for a few months now, It is holding up very well. The leather still feels hood and it def takes on an aged look pretty good. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Bi-fold, multi pocket leather wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great man's wallet! Bi-fold with lots of pockets and places for all your cards, pictures, etc. I can't find a single thing wrong with this wallet and would recommend it to anyone that drives a motorcycle, big rig, or just wants a nice wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Parks

customer_reviews.title: Useless change holder
customer_reviews.text: I loved the leather feel. I didn’t like that if you stored any coins in it. That would most likely destroy your chip on your debit card when you sit on it, That sucked.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and very great space. I ordered black but received Brown.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: I like this wallet
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a quality product at this point, I've only had this wallet for a week. I really like being able to spread out the numerous cards I carry plus the larger bill pockets is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt E

customer_reviews.title: Great quality of leather
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my fiancee an he loves it great leather
customer_reviews.author: Sugarmama

customer_reviews.title: soft and fits nicely in the front jean pocket
customer_reviews.text: Pefect... soft and fits nicely in the front jean pocket. When I'm riding I use the heavy duty chain, or I'll remove the chain for all other occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I love the leather
customer_reviews.text: I love the leather, sturdy, good looking, the only part I feel it's missing is the pocket with the window to show your drivers license... Other than that seems like a good wallet I've never had on like this with patch that holds the ring for your chain to clip onto so I hope that'll hold. We'll see!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Looking for that old school feel. This did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: i wish it had a long pocket for laying bills flat (instead of them being loose in the accordion folds), but otherwise it has a lot of card storage, which i love.
customer_reviews.author: kichi

customer_reviews.title: Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I had the wallet for about two weeks, and the belt loop fell off the chain, the little ring should be welded or soldered,

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Only words I can say that it is garbage, second one I bought wallet is pretty good but the chains broke on both wallets quickley!

customer_reviews.title: Brown2
customer_reviews.text: Wallet is the perfect size & seems durable! Only down fall is that the ID slot. Really easy to get your ID in, but a battle to get it out. Lol But overall, it’s a great product for the price! Also shipping was really fast, got my wallet 2 days earlier than what my expects delivery date was. Totally stoked!

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful travel wallet
customer_reviews.text: Simply a wonderful carrying case to use as a travel wallet, especially when having to store 2+ currencies (Euro and Pounds)
customer_reviews.author: Mark Albala

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet, but no chain included
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and seems to be good quality.. Only issue I have is that the chain was NOT included!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather
customer_reviews.text: It is great quality. I do wish it was a larger chain, but it holds all my stuff and smells great.

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Wallet is as described. It was a Christmas gift and the recipient is very happy with it. I recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Okay product..
customer_reviews.text: Wallet works great and very functional but chain only lasted a couple of days.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really like this wallet. It isn't supper quality but it is good enough for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Very bigg wallet and you definitely have to get use to the genuine leather smell its awesome 🤣.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way needed and I love vintage gear so this was needed in my possession.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is actually pretty nice.. real leather great design I got two , one Dragon one tiger.works fine and fits my iPhone plus no problem. thumbs up so far
customer_reviews.author: Jw

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and functionality of this wallet. It has more pockets than I know what to do with and it is sturdy. The leather is soft and pliable and feels good. The chain seems strong so far. Definitely was a good buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: David Gilleland

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Came sans chain. Weird shape and not the most comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.

customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing I just swapped the chain matches my red wings 1907 boots perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its coming apart already and it's on four weeks old.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wallet. It has a lot of space for my cards, and cash, material quality is outstanding. Just love it.

customer_reviews.title: This here's a quality item clark.
customer_reviews.text: The wallet itself is high quality. Snaps and zippers are of decent quality and the leather appears it will last a long time. The chain is questionable as I have already broken it once getting snagged on a door handle. It was an easy fix and it is solid enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice wallet good amount of card slots quality Leather and stitching

customer_reviews.title: I recieved mine today and I instantly fell in love. The fact that I could stash my Old ...
customer_reviews.text: I recieved mine today and I instantly fell in love. The fact that I could stash my Old iPhone 5 (which contains all of my music) is just freaking awesome as hell. I'm hoping to write a follow up review about it within a month. It's obviously going to get banged up a bit but let's see how it goes. So far... It's lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Crabb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your husband or son who likes the longer ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a very handsome case. Perfect for your husband or son who likes the longer wallet.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and fits awesome in the pocket
customer_reviews.text: Perfect wallet if you are a chain wallet person. Fits perfect and not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: adrian

customer_reviews.title: fit nice in my back pocket and look good
customer_reviews.text: Finally!! A valet that I can fit all my stuff, don't have to fold the bills, fit nice in my back pocket and look good. I bought my own chain and looks very nice 5 star for valet 3 star for chain
customer_reviews.author: Dario

product_meta.title: LUUFAN Men's Genuine Leather Long Wallet Chain Wallet, Engraved Bifold Wallet
feature_bullets: 100% Italian Full Grain Cowhide Leather (Oiled Leather)
【MATERIAL】: This wallet is made of high quality italian cowhide leather, which is natural and super smooth. It's not just goodlooking but also durable.
【VINTAGE STYLE FOR BOTH MEN AND WOMEN】: Business, shopping, daily... This wallet can meet all your occasions perfectly.
【STRUCTURE】: 14* Card slot pocket, 1* Main cash pocket (iphone7plus admissible), 1* Inner zipper pocket, 2 *Narrow cash pocket 1* Removable metal chain.
【HIGHLIGHTS】: High-quality vegetable tanned leather,super smooth and durable,with a 55cm chain to hook on beltloop,safe and fashionable.
